#### <s class="topic-title">[[Yoga Nidra]]</s> 

Translated as "[[Yoga|Yogic]] Sleep", it is a technique to achieve a deep state of relaxation.
^[[[notes_Working with Samskaras]]]

**See**:: [[Yoga]],[[body]]
